name: ddb-show
description: A tool to generate a DDB Adventure Parsing Status page
author: MrPrimate

scripts.prep: rm -rf dist/ && npm run mkdir && npm run fa-copy
scripts.css-deploy: npm run prep && npm run css-build && npm run css-postcss
scripts.start: npm run prep && npm-run-all --parallel css-watch js-watch
scripts.docs-build: npm run docs-data && npm run html
scripts.deploy: npm run css-deploy && npm run js-build && npm run docs-build
